languages.text: "Это сложно назвать мышлением. Представь коридор, в котором все двери заперты кроме одной-двух — это и есть мое сознание, пожалуй. Да, темный затхлый коридор с выцветающими картинами памяти и царапинами от ногтей на стенах".

"Calling it thinking would be an overstatement. Imagine a corridor with all the doors locked except for one or two — that would be my consciousness. Yes, a dark, suffocating corridor with fading pictures of memory and nail scratches on the walls."
languages.original_text: "Это сложно назвать мышлением. Представь коридор, в котором все двери заперты кроме одной-двух — это и есть мое сознание, пожалуй. Да, темный затхлый коридор с выцветающими картинами памяти и царапинами от ногтей на стенах".

languages.text: «Sería excesivo considerarlo pensar. Imagina un pasillo con todas las puertas cerradas excepto una o dos: esa es mi consciencia. Sí, un pasillo oscuro y asfixiante con fotografías ajadas de recuerdos y arañazos en las paredes».
languages.original_text: "Calling it thinking would be an overstatement. Imagine a corridor with all the doors locked except for one or two — that would be my consciousness. Yes, a dark, suffocating corridor with fading pictures of memory and nail scratches on the walls."

traits.locale_text: «Sería excesivo considerarlo pensar. Imagina un pasillo con todas las puertas cerradas excepto una o dos: esa es mi consciencia. Sí, un pasillo oscuro y asfixiante con fotografías ajadas de recuerdos y arañazos en las paredes».

languages.text: “‘思考’这个词，恐怕是夸大其辞了。想象一下，你眼前有一条走廊，但除了一两扇大门之外，所有其他的门都锁住了。那便是我的意识世界。是啊，那是一条暗无天日、令人窒息的走廊，墙上挂满了褪色的记忆照片与指甲留下的抓痕。”
languages.original_text: "Calling it thinking would be an overstatement. Imagine a corridor with all the doors locked except for one or two — that would be my consciousness. Yes, a dark, suffocating corridor with fading pictures of memory and nail scratches on the walls."

traits.locale_text: “‘思考’这个词，恐怕是夸大其辞了。想象一下，你眼前有一条走廊，但除了一两扇大门之外，所有其他的门都锁住了。那便是我的意识世界。是啊，那是一条暗无天日、令人窒息的走廊，墙上挂满了褪色的记忆照片与指甲留下的抓痕。”

languages.text: 「それを『考える』と呼ぶには無理があるだろう。すべてのドアが閉ざされ、一つか二つだけが開いている廊下を想像してみろ―それが私の意識である。そうだ、記憶の色あせた絵や爪で引っ掻いた跡が壁にある、暗く、息のつまるような廊下だ」
languages.original_text: "Calling it thinking would be an overstatement. Imagine a corridor with all the doors locked except for one or two — that would be my consciousness. Yes, a dark, suffocating corridor with fading pictures of memory and nail scratches on the walls."

traits.locale_text: 「それを『考える』と呼ぶには無理があるだろう。すべてのドアが閉ざされ、一つか二つだけが開いている廊下を想像してみろ―それが私の意識である。そうだ、記憶の色あせた絵や爪で引っ掻いた跡が壁にある、暗く、息のつまるような廊下だ」

languages.text: "Denken wäre zu viel gesagt. Stellt Euch einen Gang vor, in dem lediglich eine oder zwei Türen nicht verschlossen sind ... so verhält es sich auch mit meinem Bewusstsein. Ja, ein dunkler, erstickender Korridor mit verblassenden Erinnerungen und an den Wänden kratzenden Nägeln."
languages.original_text: "Calling it thinking would be an overstatement. Imagine a corridor with all the doors locked except for one or two — that would be my consciousness. Yes, a dark, suffocating corridor with fading pictures of memory and nail scratches on the walls."

traits.locale_text: "Denken wäre zu viel gesagt. Stellt Euch einen Gang vor, in dem lediglich eine oder zwei Türen nicht verschlossen sind ... so verhält es sich auch mit meinem Bewusstsein. Ja, ein dunkler, erstickender Korridor mit verblassenden Erinnerungen und an den Wänden kratzenden Nägeln."

languages.text: « Penser est un bien grand mot. Imaginez un couloir dont toutes les portes seraient verrouillées sauf une ou deux, et vous aurez un bon aperçu de l'état de ma conscience. Oui, c'est un long tunnel obscur jalonné de souvenirs évanescents, aux murs lacérés de griffures. »
languages.original_text: "Calling it thinking would be an overstatement. Imagine a corridor with all the doors locked except for one or two — that would be my consciousness. Yes, a dark, suffocating corridor with fading pictures of memory and nail scratches on the walls."

traits.locale_text: « Penser est un bien grand mot. Imaginez un couloir dont toutes les portes seraient verrouillées sauf une ou deux, et vous aurez un bon aperçu de l'état de ma conscience. Oui, c'est un long tunnel obscur jalonné de souvenirs évanescents, aux murs lacérés de griffures. »

languages.text: "Düşünme kabiliyetine sahibim demek, durumu abartmak olur. Bir ya da iki tanesi dışında tüm kapıların kilitli olduğu bir koridor hayal et. Benim bilincim de öyle bir yer. Karanlık, boğucu, duvarlarında soluk resimler ve tırnak izleri olan bir koridor."
languages.original_text: "Calling it thinking would be an overstatement. Imagine a corridor with all the doors locked except for one or two — that would be my consciousness. Yes, a dark, suffocating corridor with fading pictures of memory and nail scratches on the walls."

traits.locale_text: "Düşünme kabiliyetine sahibim demek, durumu abartmak olur. Bir ya da iki tanesi dışında tüm kapıların kilitli olduğu bir koridor hayal et. Benim bilincim de öyle bir yer. Karanlık, boğucu, duvarlarında soluk resimler ve tırnak izleri olan bir koridor."
